resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: A real-time stock data API such as Alpha Vantage or Yahoo Finance API for fetching stock information.

function: Allow users to search for stocks using either stock codes or company names.
static_description: A search bar positioned at the top of the page with a placeholder text 'Enter stock code or name', accompanied by a magnifying glass icon (searchIcon) on the right side of the input field. Background is white and input border is navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking inside the search bar focuses it and allows typing. Clicking the magnifying glass icon initiates the search.
Pressing Enter while focused in the search bar submits the query to the stock data API.

resource_dependency.autocompleteSuggestionStyle: Dropdown list styled with white background and navy borders
resource_dependency.stockSymbolList: Preloaded list of stock symbols and names for fast local matching before API call

function: Provide auto-suggested stock matches as the user types in the search bar.
static_description: An autocomplete dropdown appears below the search bar when typing begins. It displays up to maxSuggestionsToShow items from stockSymbolList, formatted in autocompleteSuggestionStyle.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a suggestion populates the search bar with the selected stock symbol or name and triggers a search.
Hovering over suggestions highlights the item visually without triggering any action until clicked.

resource_dependency.basicStockInfoSchema: Database table containing fields: symbol (string), company_name (string), sector (string), industry (string), current_price (float), last_updated (datetime)

function: Display essential stock details such as company name, sector, industry, and latest price upon selecting a stock.
static_description: A card-style layout under the search bar showing company logo (or companyLogoPlaceholder if unavailable), company name, sector, industry, and current stock price. All text uses navy color on white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking anywhere within the card expands it to show additional details like market cap, P/E ratio, and dividend yield temporarily.

resource_dependency.chartLibrary: Integration with Chart.js or D3.js library for rendering interactive charts
resource_dependency.historicalDataSchema: Database schema storing daily/hourly prices: date (date), open (float), close (float), high (float), low (float), volume (int)

function: Visualize historical stock performance through interactive line and candlestick charts.
static_description: Below the basic info card, a chart area showing price movement over time. A set of time range buttons above the chart allow switching between different periods. Charts use navy lines on white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a time range button fetches and renders the respective historical data using chartLibrary.
Hovering over chart points shows tooltip with exact value and timestamp.

resource_dependency.financialMetricsSchema: Table with columns: metric_name (string), value (float), unit (string) e.g., EPS, ROE, Debt-to-Equity Ratio

function: Show key financial indicators relevant to investment decisions.
static_description: A section beneath the chart displaying key financial metrics in a tabular format with icons from keyRatiosIconSet. Each row includes metric name, numerical value, and unit. Layout maintains white background with navy headers.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on individual rows may expand them to show definitions or historical comparisons.

function: Let users choose how they want their generated reports to look.
static_description: Radio buttons or dropdown menu labeled 'Select Format' showing available options from reportFormatOptions. Icons from formatSelectorIcons appear next to each option. White background with navy selections.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting an option updates the preview pane or generates sample output accordingly.

function: Enable users to customize which parts appear in their final report.
static_description: Checkboxes grouped vertically labeled with contentSectionOptions. Toggle switches beside each checkbox allow enabling/disabling inclusion in the report. Styled using sectionToggleSwitches.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling checkboxes enables or disables corresponding sections in the report generation logic.

resource_dependency.reportTemplateEngine: Use of templating engine like Handlebars or Jinja2 to dynamically populate content
resource_dependency.generatedReportSchema: Output structure mapping selected sections and format into HTML/PDF content blocks

function: Compile and render complete stock reports based on user-defined parameters.
static_description: Preview panel showing rendered report with title, summary, and selected content sections arranged according to chosen format. Maintains consistent styling with white background and navy text.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Generate Report' compiles the selected data and applies formatting rules to produce the full document.

resource_dependency.fileDownloadHandler: Client-side library like jsPDF or SheetJS for file creation

function: Allow exporting completed reports in commonly used digital formats.
static_description: Row of export buttons labeled with supported formats from exportFormatsSupported, each featuring an icon from exportButtonIcons. Positioned prominently near the bottom of the report preview.

interaction_and_states.description: Each button triggers download via fileDownloadHandler, generating and prompting save dialog for selected format.

resource_dependency.cssFramework: Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap configured with custom theme variables

function: Ensure consistent visual identity across all pages and components.
static_description: Entire site follows uiThemeVariables applied globally through cssFramework. White backgrounds dominate with navy accents for buttons, headers, and active states.

resource_dependency.websocketConnection: Establish WebSocket connection to real-time stock feed (e.g., via Pusher or Firebase Realtime Database)
resource_dependency.refreshIntervalSetting: Configurable timer (default 60 seconds) controlling polling frequency if streaming isn't feasible

function: Keep displayed stock data fresh and up-to-date without manual reloads.
static_description: Status indicator (e.g., green dot) visible near the top-right corner indicating live data status. Refresh interval setting accessible via settings modal.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking refresh button forces immediate update from websocketConnection or triggers new API request depending on connectivity mode.

resource_dependency.dashboardStockListSchema: User-specific watchlist stored in DB with fields: user_id (foreign key), stock_symbol (string), added_on (timestamp)
resource_dependency.miniChartComponent: Reusable component for embedding small-sized version of main chart functionality

function: Give users quick access to monitor several stocks simultaneously.
static_description: Dashboard grid presenting mini-cards for each watched stock. Cards include abbreviated info (symbol, price, % change) and embedded miniChartComponent for trend visualization. White background with navy borders.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a card navigates to the full detail view for that particular stock.

resource_dependency.customDatePickerComponent: Built-in calendar widget supporting start/end date selection

function: Permit refining views and analyses based on specific temporal boundaries.
static_description: Filter controls located above chart areas offering preset ranges from filterDatePresets alongside a custom date picker component allowing precise selections.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing a preset applies predefined dates; clicking 'Apply' after selecting custom dates filters displayed data accordingly.

resource_dependency.authSystemSchema: Users table with email (unique string), password_hash (string), created_at (datetime); Preferences table linked via user_id storing saved settings
resource_dependency.authenticationService: OAuth providers or JWT-based session management system

function: Manage secure login sessions and persist personalized configurations.
static_description: Top navigation bar contains links for Login/Register or Profile/Logout once authenticated. Authenticated users see preference-saving options throughout the app.

interaction_and_states.description: Logging in redirects to dashboard where previously saved preferences are loaded. Saving preferences stores updated values back to authSystemSchema.

resource_dependency.responsiveBreakpoints: CSS media queries targeting common device widths: mobile (<768px), tablet (768pxâ€“1024px), desktop (>1024px)
resource_dependency.touchOptimizedControls: Larger tap targets and swipe-friendly layouts for mobile devices

function: Deliver seamless experience regardless of screen size or input method.
static_description: All UI elements scale appropriately per responsiveBreakpoints. Mobile layouts stack vertically, utilize touchOptimizedControls, and hide non-critical features behind hamburger menus.

interaction_and_states.description: Resizing browser window reflows layout according to breakpoint thresholds, adjusting spacing, font sizes, and visibility of optional modules.
